Title: Love, Simon
Plot: A young coming-of-age tale about a teenage boy, Simon Spier, goes through a different kind of Romeo and Juliet story. Simon has a love connection with a boy, Blue, by email, but the only problem is that Simon has no idea who he's talking to. Simon must discover who that boy is--who Blue is. Along the way, he tries to find himself as well.
Tagline: He's done keeping his story straight.
Writers: Becky Albertalli, Elizabeth Berger, Isaac Aptaker
Stars: Nick Robinson, Jennifer Garner, Josh Duhamel, Katherine Langford
